name: NightMare Fuel (WrongRoomMedia)
description:
Head into a soda fueled nightmare in this classic rhythm runner. After downing a soda left around from the industrial age, Burt has been overtaken by an ancient evil...the Soda Demon! In his quest to keep his sugar rush going, he must avoid the onslaught of fruits and vegetables in his path to get to the nearest soda vendor. Don’t miss a beat and keep the demons at bay.

Don't ask why Burt drank from this old bottle, he can't ignore the fizzy goodness of soda. Now he's being attacked by healthy foods in order to calm him down and exorcise him of the demon that's grabbed hold of him. But Burt is on a mission to reach Bepsi Mart to continue fueling this sugar rush. With the demons following his every move, don't let the power of soda go.

Play through three fast-paced levels, where the musical challenges don't stop. Can you make it to the end without falling flat?
